trans-unit.source: Locates and lists files in the directory specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Path" /> property at run time.
trans-unit.target: 找到並列出在執行階段由 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Path" /> 屬性在目錄中指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Use this control to display a list of files selected by file type.
trans-unit.target: 使用此控制項來顯示選取的檔案類型的檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: You can create dialog boxes in your application that, for example, enable the user to select a file or group of files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立對話方塊在您的應用程式，例如，可讓使用者選取檔案群組。

trans-unit.source: If you also display the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `FileListBox` control and with each other.
trans-unit.target: 如果您也會顯示<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>控制項，您可以撰寫程式碼以同步化它們與`FileListBox`控制項並與彼此。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A `FileListBox` displays a list of files in a given directory at run time.
trans-unit.target: A`FileListBox`在執行階段顯示的檔案清單中指定的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control displays files that have <see langword="Archive" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是否顯示具有 <see langword="Archive" /> 屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if files that have the <see langword="Archive" /> attribute will be displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將顯示具有 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的檔案，則為 <see langword="Archive" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, based on standard `Archive` file attribute used in the operating environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示中的檔案類型<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>標準為基礎的控制項`Archive`作業系統的環境中使用的檔案屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property in code at run time resets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control to display only those files that have the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在執行的階段重設的程式碼中設定這個屬性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項來顯示具有指定的屬性，這些檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> 的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> interfaces, such as a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> 介面的物件，例如 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不應該設定為<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項等控制項，只是因為，為了<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要針對這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> 顯示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that represents the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，表示物件屬性的名稱，該物件屬性包含在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.DataSource" /> 屬性指定的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不應該設定為<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項等控制項，只是因為，為了<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name of the selected file in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 中選取檔案的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the file name of the selected file.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含選取檔案的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FileName` property at run time will result in only that file being displayed in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 設定`FileName`屬性在執行階段會導致只會顯示在該檔案<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control displays files that have <see langword="Hidden" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是否顯示具有 <see langword="Hidden" /> 屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if files that have the <see langword="Hidden" /> attribute will be displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將顯示具有 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的檔案，則為 <see langword="Hidden" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, based on standard `Hidden` file attribute used in the operating environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示中的檔案類型<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>標準為基礎的控制項`Hidden`作業系統的環境中使用的檔案屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property in code at run time resets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control to display only those files that have the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在執行的階段重設的程式碼中設定這個屬性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項來顯示具有指定的屬性，這些檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中項目的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property is not required for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control; the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> does not support items of variable height.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項不需要這個屬性，<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 不支援具有可變高度的項目。

trans-unit.source: It is provided only because the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control inherits from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供的原因只是因為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> representing the items in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />，代表 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be used for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> control; trying to add or remove directories from the collection could cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能用於<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>控制; 嘗試新增或移除目錄，從集合可能會導致例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的原因只是因為 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> 控制項是繼承自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> representing the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，表示該項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> that represents the items in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be used for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> control; trying to add or remove directories from the collection could cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能用於<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>控制; 嘗試新增或移除目錄，從集合可能會導致例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的原因只是因為 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> 控制項是繼承自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control displays files that have <see langword="Normal" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是否顯示具有 <see langword="Normal" /> 屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if files that have the <see langword="Normal" /> attribute will be displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將顯示具有 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的檔案，則為 <see langword="Normal" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, based on standard `Normal` file attribute used in the operating environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示中的檔案類型<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>標準為基礎的控制項`Normal`作業系統的環境中使用的檔案屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property at run time resets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control to display only those files that have the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性在執行的階段重設<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項來顯示具有指定的屬性，這些檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `OnDoubleClick` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: `OnDoubleClick`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `OnPathChange` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: `OnPathChange`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PatternChange" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PatternChange" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `OnPatternChange` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: `OnPatternChange`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `OnSelectedIndexChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: `OnSelectedIndexChanged`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current path for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 的目前路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the current path, not including the file name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含目前路徑，但不包括檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `Path` property is a string indicating a path, such as C:\Ob or C:\Windows\System.
trans-unit.target: 值`Path`屬性是字串，表示路徑，例如 C:\Ob 或 C:\Windows\System。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, the default is the current path when the control is created at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項中，預設值是目前的路徑在執行階段建立控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 當您在建立應用程式的檔案瀏覽和管理功能，請使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `Path` property has effects similar to the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are allowed with or without a drive specification.
trans-unit.target: 設定`Path`屬性有效果類似於 MS-DOS`chdir`命令; 或磁碟機規格不允許相對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Specifying only a drive with a colon (:) selects the current directory on that drive.
trans-unit.target: 使用冒號 （:） 中指定的磁碟機選取該磁碟機上目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: `Path`屬性也可以設定的完整的網路路徑不含磁碟機連線使用下列語法：

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of `Path` for a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control generates an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 值變更`Path`如<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項產生<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the path is changed by setting the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Path" /> property in code.
trans-unit.target: 發生於在程式碼中設定<see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName" /> 或 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Path" /> 屬性來變更路徑時。

trans-unit.source: You can use a `PathChange` event procedure to respond to path changes in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`PathChange`事件程序以回應中的路徑變更<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a string that contains a new path to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName%2A> property, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control invokes the `PathChange` event.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派字串，包含的新路徑<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName%2A>屬性，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>會叫用控制項`PathChange`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the file names displayed in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示在執行階段於 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項中顯示的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string expression indicating a file specification, such as "*.\*" or "\*.FRM".
trans-unit.target: 字串運算式，表示檔案規格，例如"*。\*「 或 」\*。方式 」。

trans-unit.source: The default is "\*.\*", which returns a list of all files.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"\*。\*"，它會傳回所有檔案的清單。

trans-unit.source: The `Pattern` property plays a key role in designing an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities.
trans-unit.target: `Pattern`屬性扮演重要的角色中設計的應用程式檔案瀏覽和管理功能。

trans-unit.source: Use `Pattern` in combination with other file-control properties to give the user ways to explore files or groups of similar files.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Pattern`搭配其他檔案控制項屬性，以提供使用者的方式，來瀏覽檔案或類似的檔案群組。

trans-unit.source: For example, in an application dedicated to starting other programs, you could designate that only .exe files be displayed in the file list box (*.exe).
trans-unit.target: 例如，專門用來啟動其他程式應用程式中，您可以指定，顯示唯一的.exe 檔案在檔案清單方塊 (*.exe)。

trans-unit.source: In addition to using wildcard characters, you can also use multiple patterns separated by semicolons (;).
trans-unit.target: 除了使用萬用字元，您也可以使用多種模式，並以分號 （;） 分隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, "*.exe; *.bat" would return a list of all executable files and all MS-DOS batch files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"*.exe;*.bat"會傳回所有可執行檔和所有 MS-DOS 批次檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the `Pattern` property generates a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PatternChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 值變更`Pattern`屬性會產生<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PatternChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the file listing pattern, such as "*.\*", is changed by setting the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Pattern" /> property in code.
trans-unit.target: 發生於檔案清單模式 (如 "*.\*") 是透過設定程式碼中的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName" /> 或 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Pattern" /> 屬性來進行變更時。

trans-unit.source: You can use a `PatternChange` event procedure to respond to pattern changes in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`PatternChange`事件程序以回應中的模式變更<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a string that contains a new pattern to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName%2A> property, the FileListBox invokes the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派字串，包含新的模式，來<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.FileName%2A>叫用的屬性，FileListBox<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.PathChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control contains files that have read-only attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是否包含具有唯讀屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if files that have the <see langword="ReadOnly" /> attribute will be displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將顯示具有 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的檔案，則為 <see langword="ReadOnly" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the `ReadOnly` property for a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control to specify whether files that have read-only attributes are displayed in the file list or not.
trans-unit.target: 使用`ReadOnly`屬性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項，指定是否檔案具有唯讀屬性會顯示在檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Normal%2A> property is set to `true` (the default), files that have read-only attributes are displayed regardless of the `ReadOnly` property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.Normal%2A>屬性設定為`true`檔案具有唯讀屬性會顯示 （預設值），不論`ReadOnly`屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.
trans-unit.target: 強制控制項使其工作區失效，並且立即重繪其本身。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Refresh" /> in a derived class, make sure to call the <see langword="Refresh" /> method of the base class so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see langword="Refresh" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see langword="Refresh" />讓失效並且重繪控制項和其子控制項的基底類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 中的項目是否依照字母順序排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if items in the control are sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項中的項目已經排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, `Sorted` always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項，`Sorted`一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> control displays files that have <see langword="System" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox" /> 控制項是否顯示具有 <see langword="System" /> 屬性的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if files that have the <see langword="System" /> attribute will be displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將顯示具有 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的檔案，則為 <see langword="System" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control, based on standard `System` file attribute used in the operating environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示中的檔案類型<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>標準為基礎的控制項`System`作業系統的環境中使用的檔案屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property at run time resets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control to display only those files that have the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性在執行的階段重設<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項來顯示具有指定的屬性，這些檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to use as the actual value for the items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要當做 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> 中項目之實際值使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> representing the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，表示物件屬性的名稱，而此物件屬性包含在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox.DataSource" /> 屬性指定的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不應該設定為<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項等控制項，只是因為，為了<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>控制項繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。
